20101215170008.250|20101215170009.500|CCO|DO?
20101215170009.500|20101215170010.750|CCO|>> REALLY, IT'S SO SIMPLE.
20101215170010.750|20101215170012.000|CCO|THIS GENTLEMAN, HE REPRESENTS A 
20101215170012.000|20101215170014.500|CCO|MAN NAMED TIMOTHY BROWN, A 
20101215170014.500|20101215170017.000|CCO|44-YEAR-OLD AMERICAN MAN LIVING 
20101215170017.000|20101215170019.500|CCO|IN GERMANY.
20101215170019.500|20101215170022.000|CCO|HE HAD CANCER AND HIV.
20101215170022.000|20101215170024.000|CCO|THEY NEEDED TO GIVE HIM A STEM 
20101215170024.000|20101215170026.000|CCO|CELL TRANSPLANT FOR THE CANCER, 
20101215170026.000|20101215170028.000|CCO|SO THEY GAVE HIM CHEMO AND 
20101215170028.000|20101215170030.000|CCO|RADIATION TO WIPE OUT HIS IMMUNE
20101215170030.000|20101215170032.000|CCO|SYSTEM.
20101215170032.000|20101215170034.000|CCO|HE HAD NO MORE IMMUNE SYSTEM.
20101215170034.000|20101215170036.000|CCO|THEN THEY FOUND A DONOR TO 
20101215170036.000|20101215170038.000|CCO|BASICALLY GIVE HIM AN IMMUNE 
20101215170038.000|20101215170040.000|CCO|SYSTEM.
20101215170040.000|20101215170042.000|CCO|THE DONOR WAS VERY SPECIAL.
20101215170042.000|20101215170044.500|CCO|BUT WHAT THEY DID, THEY TOOK THE
20101215170044.500|20101215170047.000|CCO|STEM CELL FROM THE DONOR AND 
20101215170047.000|20101215170049.500|CCO|GAVE IT TO THE PATIENT.
20101215170049.500|20101215170052.000|CCO|THEY FOLLOWED HIM FOR A NUMBER 
20101215170052.000|20101215170054.000|CCO|OF YEARS AND FOUND OUT TODAY, 
20101215170054.000|20101215170056.000|CCO|THAT NOT ONLY IS HE CANCER FREE,
20101215170056.000|20101215170058.000|CCO|BUT HIV FREE.
20101215170058.000|20101215170100.000|CCO|THEY HAVE LOOKED AND HAVE NOT 
20101215170100.000|20101215170102.000|CCO|BEEN ABLE TO FIND ANY EVIDENCE 
20101215170102.000|20101215170103.667|CCO|OF HIV IN HIS BODY AND HE 
20101215170103.667|20101215170105.333|CCO|DOESN'T HAVE TO TAKE HIV DRUGS 
20101215170105.333|20101215170107.000|CCO|ANYMORE.
20101215170107.000|20101215170108.667|CCO|THE PEOPLE WHO WROTE THIS UP 
20101215170108.667|20101215170110.333|CCO|SAID, SOUNDS LIKE A CURE TO US.
20101215170110.333|20101215170112.000|CCO|>> SO WHY CAN'T THIS WORK FOR 
20101215170112.000|20101215170113.667|CCO|EVERYBODY?
20101215170113.667|20101215170115.333|CCO|>> THIS CAN'T WORK FOR ANYBODY 
20101215170115.333|20101215170117.000|CCO|BECAUSE LET'S GO BACK.
20101215170117.000|20101215170118.667|CCO|AS I SAID, THIS IS A VERY 
20101215170118.667|20101215170120.333|CCO|SPECIAL DONOR.
20101215170120.333|20101215170122.000|CCO|HE OR SHE.
20101215170122.000|20101215170125.333|CCO|THIS DONOR IS ONE OF THE VERY, 
20101215170125.333|20101215170128.667|CCO|VERY FEW PEOPLE WHO IS RESISTANT
20101215170128.667|20101215170132.000|CCO|TO HIV.
20101215170132.000|20101215170134.000|CCO|YOU COULD TRY TO GIVE IT TO HIM 
20101215170134.000|20101215170136.000|CCO|OR HER, BUT WOULDN'T GET IT.
20101215170136.000|20101215170138.000|CCO|THEY SOUGHT OUT A DONOR LIKE 
20101215170138.000|20101215170140.000|CCO|THAT ON PURPOSE BECAUSE THE 
20101215170140.000|20101215170142.000|CCO|PERSON HAD HIV, SO YOU HAVE TO 
20101215170142.000|20101215170143.667|CCO|GET A VERY SPECIAL DONOR AND THE
20101215170143.667|20101215170145.333|CCO|DONOR HAS TO MATCH TO THE 
20101215170145.333|20101215170147.000|CCO|PATIENT.
20101215170147.000|20101215170148.667|CCO|>> AND THERE'S
20101215170148.667|20101215170150.333|CCO|SERIOUS RISKS TO THIS AS WELL.
20101215170150.333|20101215170152.000|CCO|>> THERE ARE.
20101215170152.000|20101215170154.000|CCO|IF SOMEONE WITH HIV WENT TO 
20101215170154.000|20101215170156.000|CCO|THEIR DOCTOR TOMORROW AND SAID, 
20101215170156.000|20101215170158.000|CCO|HEY, I WANT THIS, THE DOCTOR 
20101215170158.000|20101215170200.000|CCO|WOULD WISELY SAY, NO.
20101215170200.000|20101215170202.000|CCO|THIS PATIENT COULD HAVE DIED 
20101215170202.000|20101215170204.000|CCO|FROM THE TRANSPLANT AND WE HAVE 
20101215170204.000|20101215170206.000|CCO|GREAT HIV DRUGS TO TREAT HIV, SO
